        <name>ProjectManagementRomeUpgradeHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ProjectManagementRomeUpgradeHelper = Class.create();
ProjectManagementRomeUpgradeHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	updateReferenceQualifierOnProject: function(fieldName){
		try{
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
			gr.addQuery('name', 'pm_project');
			gr.addQuery('element', fieldName);
			gr.query();
			if(gr.next()) {
				if(fieldName == 'business_unit'){
					if(!gr.getValue('reference_qual')){
						gr.setValue('reference_qual', 'javascript: new global.ProjectManagementUtils().getActiveBusinessUnitIdsForProject(current);');
						gr.update();
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on project table has been updated');
					}
					else {
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on project table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
					}
				}
				else if(fieldName == 'department'){
					if(gr.getValue('reference_qual') == "javascript: current.business_unit ? 'business_unit=' + current.business_unit : ''"){
						gr.setValue('reference_qual', 'javascript: new global.ProjectManagementUtils().getActiveDepartmentIdsForProject(current);');
						gr.update();
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on project table has been updated');
					}
					else {
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on project table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
					}
				}
				else if(fieldName == 'primary_portfolio'){
					if(gr.getValue('reference_qual') == 'javascript:"sys_class_name="+SNC.PPMConfig.getPortfolioTable(current.getTableName())'){
						gr.setValue('reference_qual', 'javascript: new global.ProjectManagementUtils().getActivePortfolioIdsForProject(current);');
						gr.update();
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on project table has been updated');
					}
					else {
						gs.log('Reference qualifier of '+fieldName+' on project table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
					}
				}
			} 
			else {
				gs.log(fieldName+' on project table does not exist');
			}
		}
		catch (err){
			gs.log('Error occurred in updating reference qualifier on '+fieldName+': '+err);
		}
	},
	updateDefaultValueOnProject: function(fieldName){
		try{
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
			gr.addQuery('name', 'pm_project');
			gr.addQuery('element', fieldName);
			gr.query();
			if(gr.next()) {
				if(!gr.getValue('default_value')){
					if(fieldName == 'primary_portfolio'){
						gr.setValue('default_value', 'javascript: new global.ProjectManagementUtils().getDefaultPortfolioIdForProject(current);');
					}
					gr.update();
					gs.log('Default value of '+fieldName+' on project table has been updated');
				}
				else {
					gs.log('Default value of '+fieldName+' on project table has been defined already and hence not upgrading');
				}
			} 
			else {
				gs.log(fieldName+' on project table does not exist');
			}
		}
		catch (err){
			gs.log('Error occurred in updating default value on '+fieldName+': '+err);
		}
	},

    type: 'ProjectManagementRomeUpgradeHelper'
};]]></script>
